title: Lamar Odom reportedly overdosed on drugs
text:
Lamar Odom reportedly overdosed on drugs Drugs were found in Lamar Odom's system after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, E! News reports. More >> Drugs were found in Lamar Odom's system after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, E! News reports. More >> Khloe Kardashian is making medical decisions on Lamar Odom's behalf Things are not looking good for Lamar Odom and the Kardashian family. Odom is currently in a coma and remains unresponsive in a Las Vegas hospital. More >> Things are not looking good for Lamar Odom and the Kardashian family. Odom is currently in a coma and remains unresponsive in a Las Vegas hospital. More >> Hayden Panettiere enters treatment center for postpartum depression After struggling with postpartum depression since the birth of her daughter, Hayden Panettiere is reaching out for a helping hand. More >> After struggling with postpartum depression since the birth of her daughter, Hayden Panettiere is reaching out for a helping hand. More >> 
By Sadie Gennis, 
Drugs were found in Lamar Odom 's system after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, E! News reports. 
According to a source, Odom remains unconscious and his condition is being treated as an overdose. It's possible he also suffered an ischemic stroke, which is when a blood clot stops blood flow to the brain. 
"So, likely there's brain damage, but they're not sure how much," the source said. "Virtually every drug imaginable was found in his system." 
The insider went on to say that Odom had been doing excessive amounts of crack cocaine throughout the weekend and choked on his mucus. 
After the former Laker was found unconscious Tuesday afternoon, his ex-wife Khloe Kardashian rushed to the Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas where Odom is being treated.
